The Catholic Church needs some changes. They are losing followers. Many people do not like the Church's views on some things. These things include gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. The Church has strong views on these subjects, but some people think these views are old-fashioned.

If the Church changed its views, it might not lose followers. Some people are unhappy with the Church's views. They do not agree with the Church on certain subjects. This is why some people are leaving the Church.

The Church does not like abortion. If you support abortion, you might not feel comfortable in the Church. The Church also does not like gay marriage. If you support gay marriage, you might not want to be in the Church.

The Church does not allow women to be priests. They also do not allow priests to marry. The Church says priests are married to God. But most people have jobs and families. Priests should be able to have both.

The Catholic Church should be open to new ideas. They should listen to people's opinions. This way, they can understand why people are leaving the Church. The Church should be accepting of different views. This will help them keep their followers.

I think gay people should have the right to get married. I don't think it's a choice. People are born gay. It's not something they can choose.

I don't think it's fair to say that a man and a woman can get married, but two people of the same sex can't. That's not right.

It's not a choice, like being straight or left-handed. People are born the way they are.

I don't think the government should make laws about this. It's not a matter of national security or morals. It's just about letting people be who they are.

We should let gay people be themselves. We shouldn't punish them for being gay. They didn't choose to be gay.

The government should stay out of it. They don't have the right to tell people how to live their lives.

In my opinion, everyone should have the right to marry who they love, no matter what their sex.

I think gay marriage should be allowed. There is no good reason it should not be. Many people think that gay couples are a threat to the traditional family. However, this is not true. Gay couples are the same as straight couples in many ways. They have the same kinds of relationships and responsibilities.

One problem with gay couples is that they are not allowed to visit their partners in the hospital. This is not fair. They are also not allowed to make medical decisions for each other. This is a civil rights issue. Gay couples should have the same rights as straight couples.

Many studies have shown that gay couples are successful and happy, just like straight couples. They have the same kinds of relationships and problems. They are not asking for the right to get married in a church. They just want a marriage certificate from the government.

If a civil union is allowed, why not a marriage? It's like segregation - separate but unequal. Gay couples are the same in many ways. They have the same roles and responsibilities.

Some people worry about adoption and children. But the main problem is how children are treated by their peers and other adults. In some places, like New York City, gay parents have to send their children to special schools because they are bullied in public schools.

This is not fair. Gay parents are just like straight parents. They love their children and want to take care of them. They should be treated with respect.

The federal government should be involved in this issue. They should make gay marriage legal in every state. The government should not make laws based on one person's religion. This would be hypocritical.

Some people are against gay marriage because they think gay people are damaged or flawed. But this is not true. Many experts have studied this issue and say it is not true.

We should listen to experts and not just our friends or neighbors. We should look at the facts and treat everyone with respect.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. This experience makes me think. Some people believe a drug is bad because it is illegal. But that is not always true. A drug can be bad or good for your health.

I think there should not be a law that makes marijuana available to the public. But it can be used to help people who are sick. There is no reason to say no to its good effects.

In hospitals, we use some medicines that are illegal. They are called controlled substances. These medicines are useful and we use them every day. If we deny the good effects of marijuana because it is a taboo, that is not fair.

Marijuana is not like alcohol. If you abuse marijuana, it can cause problems. But if you abuse alcohol, it also causes problems. It is a difficult decision.

I think marijuana should not be made legal suddenly. It should be made legal in small steps. If it is made legal all at once, people might abuse it. But if we remove the bad image of marijuana, people might use it responsibly.

People have a bad opinion of marijuana because it is illegal. But it is not as bad as other drugs like heroin or cocaine. If we change people's minds about marijuana, they might use it for medical reasons.

The church is now more modern. It is not as strict as it was before. I grew up going to church every Sunday. I got nice dresses and shoes. It was a happy time. I attended a private school. I saw my friends on the weekends. We would go to church together.

Now, the church has a special service for teenagers. It is only thirty minutes long. People wear casual clothes, like jeans and t-shirts. Even on Sundays, people wear casual clothes. In the summer, people wear beach clothes. Some people are late to church.

The church is not as formal as it used to be. People dress more casually now. This is the main thing I noticed.

I do not know the church's rules and politics. But the biggest thing I noticed is the change in dress.

Some people accused the Catholic Church of not stopping priests who abuse children. I think the church could not have stopped these problems. Some men who are married still abuse children. It is not because they are married or not married. It is because of the person's choice.

Some religions allow priests to be married. But it does not stop the abuse. The person's choice is to abuse or not to abuse.

I think people are born with their sexuality. It is not because of how they are raised. Genetics are important. You cannot hide your genetics with a marriage. If you try to hide it, it will come out.

The church cannot stop people from abusing children. If they know about it and hide it, that is wrong. But I do not think the church knew about all of the abuse.

I have no other thoughts about the Catholic Church.

I was okay with the idea at first, but I think everyone was still upset about the 9/11 attacks. We went into Iraq for reasons that may not have been true. The Bush administration connected the Iraq war to 9/11 and said Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction, but that was not true.

This makes me very upset. I think the Bush administration lied to the American people and did not admit to it. Even Colin Powell later said he was not sure about the evidence. This is wrong and can be punished.

I think the Bush administration does not respect the American Constitution. They have tried to change it since 9/11. They wanted to go to war from the beginning. 

The Secretary of the Treasury wrote a book saying that the younger Bush wanted to go to war with Iraq because of his father's experience. This was not honest.

The war has gone on too long. If we leave now, it may cause more problems and more people will die. The UN and the US are trying to work with countries in the area to help Iraq. But I am not sure this will work. Iraq will have problems with its own government.

The news says that the Iraqi government is not working well. The Prime Minister does not have control, and there are many groups fighting for power. This is causing problems for the country.

I do not know what the best solution is.

I will talk about the war in Iraq. 

I am not sure where to start. 

It is not really a declared war. I mean, we did not officially say we are at war. 

I think the United States wanted revenge because Iraq was blamed for the attacks on 9/11. 

I do not know a lot about the war, but I think we are there to help Iraq become a democracy like the United States. We also want their oil. 

But, I do not think this is a good reason to stay in Iraq. It makes many people unhappy. 

If we stay, it will take a long time to build democracy. It is not something that can be done quickly. 

If we leave, Iraqis will be angry with us. They will have to start over again. 

This is a difficult topic. I do not know what to say. 

I think the war should continue, but I do not think it should be called a war. It was not officially declared by Congress. 

We should only use force to show that we are strong and powerful. 

I do not think it is fair to call it a war anymore. It was never a real war in the first place. 

I feel bad for President Bush. The war is making him look bad. 

I remember the Vietnam War. It was also an undeclared war and it was called a meaningless war. 

I do not know what to say. 

I want the war to end, but there are many families with loved ones in Iraq. I do not want them to get hurt. 

But, I also do not want to stay in Iraq and try to change their culture. It will just make things worse. 

I think the war will continue for a long time. It will be very difficult to solve.

I do not think it is right for a state to make something legal or illegal. The constitution says there should be a separation of church and state. This means the government should not control what churches can and cannot do.

It is clear in the constitution. If the government tries to do this, it will be against what is written. I think people who want to make it illegal are choosing one church's idea over another. Most Catholics and Christians do not support this except in some areas.

The government should not tell churches what to do. The separation of church and state is an important part of the constitution. It allows for freedom of religion in the United States. Making a law to change this would be wrong.

It would be against what is already written in the constitution. It would be a law that restricts people, not the government. This is not right.

I do not think the federal government or any government should be involved in this issue. The president is pushing for a law that is against his own personal beliefs as a Catholic. This shows he has a preference for one religion over others.

I think it is up to the churches to decide, not the government. There is no good reason for the law except that some people have personal views. The law will not affect the economy, and it might even help the country.

In fact, it could have a good effect on society. I think I have said enough.

The war in Iraq was a big problem. The US government was not honest with the people about why they went to war. They said the war was connected to the terrorist attacks on September 11th. But that was not true.

I do not like war. I think the US government made a big mistake by going to war. They thought it would be easy to make Iraq a democracy. But it was not. The US government was not prepared for the problems that would come after they removed the Iraqi government.

Many American soldiers died in the war. This is very sad. The US government did not think about what would happen after they took away Iraq's government. They did not think about the power vacuum and the chaos that would come.

The US government tried to make a democracy in Iraq, just like they tried to do in Vietnam. But it was not easy. It is not easy to install a new government. It takes time and many people were against the US government's actions.

I think the US government should not have gone to war. They were not prepared for the problems that would come. They should have thought about what would happen after they removed the Iraqi government.

We have been in Iraq for a long time. Many American soldiers are still dying. The US government is still training the Iraqi army and police. This is a long process.

I think the US government was not honest with the American people. They said the war would be easy and quick. But it has not been. Democracy is not easy to create. It takes time and many people were against the US government's actions.

It is hard to decide what to do in Iraq. The US government took away the Iraqi government and their way of life. Now they have to stay and finish what they started. But they are also risking many American lives.

There are many reasons for the war. One reason was oil. The US wants to control the oil in Iraq. Another reason was that the US thought Iraq had weapons of mass destruction. But they did not find any.

I hope the war ends soon and there is peace in Iraq. But I do not think it will be easy.

I am for gay marriage. I have always been. It is a personal preference. People should have the right to make their own choices.

Gay marriage is not something you can control. Some people are born this way. It is not something you can change. 

Giving people less rights because of something they cannot control is not fair. It is inhumane.

I think politics and government should not decide who can get married. Marriage is a personal thing. It is not a government issue.

In my neighborhood, there are some gay couples. They are not married because they are not allowed to. But they are the same as other families. They take care of their homes and their pets.

The President cannot decide what marriage is. He should not make laws to tell people who can and cannot get married.

I have read that some people are born gay. It is not because of how they are raised. It is a natural thing.

Marriage should be private. If a man and a woman want to get married, they can do it in secret. But if two men or two women want to get married, it becomes a big public issue. It should not be that way.

People should be able to make their own choices about marriage. It should not be a public issue.

When you put something on the internet, it is public. Anyone can see it. 

As a resident advisor, I have seen this happen. Someone posts something online, and it affects how people think of them. 

If someone talks about hurting others or doing something bad, people will react. You cannot put that on the internet. It will be seen by everyone. 

If you are friends with someone on the internet, you will get their messages. But the school did not send the message. Someone else did. The school has to act on it because they want to keep everyone safe. 

You cannot be sure what to believe because some people are just joking. But what if it is serious? 

Something happened at my school. Someone overheard someone saying something bad. They called the school, and we found out who said it. This person had something on their Facebook that looked serious. But it was meant as a joke. 

When you put things on the internet, it is not private. If you do not want people to see it, do not put it there. You cannot control what people think. 

School officials should not be friends with students on the internet. But if someone brings something to their attention, they have to act. They have to keep students safe. 

A teacher should not make a fake account to be friends with students. That is not fair. As a resident advisor, I do not want to know about my residents' personal lives. I just want to help them if they need it.

I think the war has lasted too long. 
The original goal was good. We wanted to help another country get democracy. 

But then we lost sight of that goal. 
Now, some people think we are fighting just to show the world we are strong. 

I do not think that is a good reason to fight. 
The problem started when we were still mad about what the previous president of the US did with Saddam Hussein. 

If we wanted to give democracy to a country ruled by a dictator, that was a good reason to fight. 
But our reason for fighting changed over time. 
Now, it seems like we are fighting just to keep fighting. 

We don't want to end the war without winning, but it has been too long. 
The country we are fighting in should be able to take care of itself now. 
We are spending too much money on this war. 
We have problems at home, like poverty and bad roads. 
We should use that money to help our own people.

Our money is being spent to fight a war we may not be winning. 
We should use it for things like schools, roads and healthcare. 
This is more important than spending it to fight in a foreign country.

I have a question. I want to understand the situation.

You see, someone went online and found something. A person might not like this, but I think it is okay. If you put information on the internet, it is usually public. Many people can see it.

For example, on Myspace, you need to be friends with someone to see their profile. But if you are friends, you have given permission to see their information. So, when you are online, you must know that many people can see what you write.

I think it is good that someone saw something and helped prevent trouble. But it is hard. We can't have someone watching everyone's profiles all day. That would be unfair. We can't pick on certain people and watch them closely. That is not fair.

It depends on why someone saw the profile. Were they looking for something specific or just browsing? I don't know.

I have a Facebook account. It bothers me that there are people who can see my information. I know a man on TV who showed how easy it is to get information from someone's profile. He talked to a girl on instant messenger and got her screen name quickly.

It's hard because you think you are safe, but you are not. People can find out your interests, what you look like, and where you are. I try to limit what I put on my account, but I don't want to limit it too much. The point of having a Facebook is to communicate with friends.

I only accept people I know, but I don't know who can see my information. My roommate told me about a school that banned students from having Myspace. I don't know if that is right. Can school officials tell students what to do on the internet?

That's my thought.

I want to talk about the Iraq War. I know it's a sensitive topic. I was against the war from the start, but it's not a big deal now. Most people think it was a bad idea. 

In the United States, in Iraq, and all over the world, most people think we made a mistake. In the United States, 75 to 80 percent of people think so. In Iraq, 80 percent of people think so. 70 percent of American soldiers in Iraq also think the war was a bad idea.

Leaving Iraq will also be difficult. But it's already a disaster. We should not go into another country and try to make it like us. We must respect their way of life. 

Saddam Hussein was a bad man, but we should think before we go to war. We must think about the good and the bad. 

I don't think we should stay in Iraq anymore. We have not found a good reason to stay. If we leave slowly over a year or more, I don't have a problem. But I don't think we should stay any longer.

Most Iraqis want us to leave. They think we should be gone in a year. They are the people we are trying to help. If they say leave, we should listen. If things go badly, we can say we did what they wanted.

We can be the good guys if we leave. We will never be fully accepted in the Middle East, but we will be better than we are now.

I think gender discrimination is still a problem in the United States. It is not only for women, but also for men in certain jobs.

Women often face more difficulties in many areas. This is because of a thing called the glass ceiling. It means even if there is supposed to be equality, it is hard for people to accept a woman as their boss. This is because of how society has been for a long time.

In many jobs, women can do all the work, but they may not get promoted because it is not common for women to be in charge. This is not only for women, but also for men in jobs like fashion or being a stay-at-home parent.

In some societies, men are expected to work and make money, not stay home with the children. If a man stays home, people may think he is not doing the right thing. They may look down on him.

In the fashion industry, men who like fashion may not be taken seriously if they are not like other men. People may think they do not know what fashion is for women. But this is changing.

It is slow to change, but women are getting more accepted in business and becoming CEOs. Men who stay home with their children are also becoming more accepted. People are starting to understand that women can have good jobs and men can stay home with the children.

To change this, we need to show the good qualities of people who are stereotyped. We should not push people to accept change, but show them the good things. If we do it too fast, people will resist. We have made good progress, and change takes time.

People can be discriminated against because of where they are from or their job. For example, if someone from a farm goes to a big city and gets a job as a CEO, other people may not take him seriously because of his accent or grammar.

However, this is not just between men and women. People from different places can also be discriminated against.

My understanding is that some places don't make marijuana use a crime. Instead, they give a ticket to people who use it. This is like getting a traffic ticket. It means you don't get arrested and go to jail.

This change is good because it saves money. It costs a lot to arrest and take people to court. It costs money to pay for judges, public defenders, and the police. Some places are not willing to change the law, even if it would save them money. But some places, like Denver, are more open-minded.

In Denver, people can use marijuana and it's not a big problem. This means the city has more money to spend on good things, like education and programs to help the elderly and people who don't have food.

People should think carefully about marijuana. It's not good for everyone to use it all the time. There are reasons why it's not good to use it in public. Some people might think it's not right to see people smoking marijuana in public.

Alcohol can cause problems too. It can hurt your ability to drive and make decisions. Marijuana can also cause problems, but it's different for different people. Some people can use it and it doesn't affect them much. Others might have a harder time.

It's hard to say how people will react to marijuana because everyone is different. Some people can control how much they use, and some people can't. We should be careful when thinking about marijuana because it can have bad effects on people's lives.

I think yes. 

Because many things about the Catholic Church are old customs. 

They do things in the same way for a long time. This is good because it helps keep traditions. 

But it's also important to change. 

Many Catholics believe they must go to church every week. They are strict about how things are done. 

Sometimes I think the Catholic Church does not respect people who do not follow all the rules. They do not like people from other religions. 

For example, my mom was Episcopalian and my dad was too. They wanted to get married in the Catholic Church, but they could not because of my dad's religion. 

This is not being kind to others. The Catholic Church teaches to love others. But it's not kind to not accept people who are different. 

I think some Catholic rules are good, but the way the Church acts is different. It's not fair to say one thing and do another. 

I do not think this would change how I feel. I think it would be good to allow priests to marry, but it might not stop them from behaving badly. 

People who hurt children might do this no matter if they are married or not. 

So, I do not think allowing priests to marry would stop this from happening. It would still happen.

I am not sure about this issue. 
I don't know if one side is right or wrong. 
This is a very difficult problem. 
It is between the church and the government. 
We must define marriage without hurting anyone's feelings. 
I am not sure how to do this. 

All civil unions are the same. 
But the government may or may not give them the same rights. 
If two people are married, they should be treated the same as anyone else. 
This is a civil union, not a church thing. 

Two people are together, that is all. 
The government should not ask about the church. 
The fact that some people are gay does not matter. 
They are still two people in a union. 

If all states agree, they should make it a federal law. 
Making a rule in the constitution to stop gay marriage is not right. 
This is not important enough to change the constitution. 
We should not change the constitution just for one big issue. 

I don't think so.

I was raised in a Christian home. For me, homosexuality is a difficult issue. I have many gay friends. 

I do not agree with all aspects of their lifestyle. However, I think it should be legal. It should not be a national problem. Each state should decide for itself. The president should not make a rule for the whole country.

Some states are democratic and some are republican. Democratic states will likely support gay marriage. If you live in a democratic state, you should respect its decision. You chose to live there.

I think gay people should have the same rights as straight people. Each state should decide if it wants to allow gay marriage. It is a state's choice.

I already said this. I do not think the president should decide for the whole country. George Bush should not decide how all states should be. Each state should decide for itself. He does not live in every state.

Some things should be decided by each state. The president will leave office soon. If a new president wants to change the law, it will change back and forth. It is better if each state decides for itself. They will live with the decision, not the president.

No, I do not think the president should make this decision. It should be up to each state.

When I think about Myspace, I remember it's a public website. If you post something there, everyone can see it. This includes school officials.

If you post something on the internet, you should think about who can see it.  School officials can look at Myspace, even if they're not looking for something under the school's name. They can see it from their homes.

In my opinion, school officials have the right to see things on the internet if it helps keep students safe. If they see something that prevents a school shooting, that's good.

School officials can look at Myspace to see if students are doing things they shouldn't be doing. But I think this is an invasion of privacy. However, if they help keep students safe, I don't think it's an invasion.

It's true that the internet is a public place. But the school should be a safe place. If school officials can make it safer, that's okay.

When you post something on the internet, it's hard to control who sees it. If you write something bad about someone, you might regret it. The person could see it and it could hurt you.

In this case, the school officials were trying to keep students safe. They were checking the internet to prevent something bad from happening, like a school shooting.

School officials are like parents. When parents drop off their children at school, they want to know the school is a safe place. School officials have to make sure the school is safe.

I was in a public high school, and we practiced lockdown drills in case of an attack. We wanted to be prepared. The school officials were trying to do the same thing. They were checking the internet to keep students safe.

They were preventing something bad from happening, like a school shooting. They were doing what was necessary to make the school a safer place.

I was affected by the attack on 9/11. At first, I thought we should go to war. I wanted to help.

But I now think we made a mistake. We did not think about the long-term effects of our actions.

We did not plan carefully. We went to war without a clear goal. This led to problems.

I do not think we helped the people in that area. They fight among themselves. They cannot work together.

If they cannot work together, it does not matter if we are there or not. Our presence did not make things better.

I am sad about what happened on 9/11. But now I do not care about the situation in that area. They are not interested in helping themselves.

War is different for them than it is for us. They fight in a way that is not civilized. Our goal was not to improve their country, but to get us out of there. I think that is a good idea.

We should have thought about what might happen before we went to war. We were angry and wanted revenge. We did not think about the future.

The President declared war on Iraq. I understand why he did it. But we should have had a clear plan.

We did not know what to do in that area. We did not have a clear goal. We did not have a plan to create order. This made things worse.

I do not think we can change those people. They will always be the same. We are not doing enough to help them. We are only hurting ourselves by staying there.

We have made some progress, but it is not enough. It is time to leave. If we do not, things will only get worse. We cannot stay there forever.

transformed_texts:
The Catholic Church needs some changes. They are losing followers. Many people do not like the Church's views on some things. These things include gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. The Church has strong views on these subjects, but some people think these views are old-fashioned.

If the Church changed its views, it might not lose followers. Some people are unhappy with the Church's views. They do not agree with the Church on certain subjects. This is why some people are leaving the Church.

The Church does not like abortion. If you support abortion, you might not feel comfortable in the Church. The Church also does not like gay marriage. If you support gay marriage, you might not want to be in the Church.

The Church does not allow women to be priests. They also do not allow priests to marry. The Church says priests are married to God. But most people have jobs and families. Priests should be able to have both.

The Catholic Church should be open to new ideas. They should listen to people's opinions. This way, they can understand why people are leaving the Church. The Church should be accepting of different views. This will help them keep their followers.

I think gay people should have the right to get married. I don't think it's a choice. People are born gay. It's not something they can choose.

I don't think it's fair to say that a man and a woman can get married, but two people of the same sex can't. That's not right.

It's not a choice, like being straight or left-handed. People are born the way they are.

I don't think the government should make laws about this. It's not a matter of national security or morals. It's just about letting people be who they are.

We should let gay people be themselves. We shouldn't punish them for being gay. They didn't choose to be gay.

The government should stay out of it. They don't have the right to tell people how to live their lives.

In my opinion, everyone should have the right to marry who they love, no matter what their sex.

I think gay marriage should be allowed. There is no good reason it should not be. Many people think that gay couples are a threat to the traditional family. However, this is not true. Gay couples are the same as straight couples in many ways. They have the same kinds of relationships and responsibilities.

One problem with gay couples is that they are not allowed to visit their partners in the hospital. This is not fair. They are also not allowed to make medical decisions for each other. This is a civil rights issue. Gay couples should have the same rights as straight couples.

Many studies have shown that gay couples are successful and happy, just like straight couples. They have the same kinds of relationships and problems. They are not asking for the right to get married in a church. They just want a marriage certificate from the government.

If a civil union is allowed, why not a marriage? It's like segregation - separate but unequal. Gay couples are the same in many ways. They have the same roles and responsibilities.

Some people worry about adoption and children. But the main problem is how children are treated by their peers and other adults. In some places, like New York City, gay parents have to send their children to special schools because they are bullied in public schools.

This is not fair. Gay parents are just like straight parents. They love their children and want to take care of them. They should be treated with respect.

The federal government should be involved in this issue. They should make gay marriage legal in every state. The government should not make laws based on one person's religion. This would be hypocritical.

Some people are against gay marriage because they think gay people are damaged or flawed. But this is not true. Many experts have studied this issue and say it is not true.

We should listen to experts and not just our friends or neighbors. We should look at the facts and treat everyone with respect.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. This experience makes me think. Some people believe a drug is bad because it is illegal. But that is not always true. A drug can be bad or good for your health.

I think there should not be a law that makes marijuana available to the public. But it can be used to help people who are sick. There is no reason to say no to its good effects.

In hospitals, we use some medicines that are illegal. They are called controlled substances. These medicines are useful and we use them every day. If we deny the good effects of marijuana because it is a taboo, that is not fair.

Marijuana is not like alcohol. If you abuse marijuana, it can cause problems. But if you abuse alcohol, it also causes problems. It is a difficult decision.

I think marijuana should not be made legal suddenly. It should be made legal in small steps. If it is made legal all at once, people might abuse it. But if we remove the bad image of marijuana, people might use it responsibly.

People have a bad opinion of marijuana because it is illegal. But it is not as bad as other drugs like heroin or cocaine. If we change people's minds about marijuana, they might use it for medical reasons.

The church is now more modern. It is not as strict as it was before. I grew up going to church every Sunday. I got nice dresses and shoes. It was a happy time. I attended a private school. I saw my friends on the weekends. We would go to church together.

Now, the church has a special service for teenagers. It is only thirty minutes long. People wear casual clothes, like jeans and t-shirts. Even on Sundays, people wear casual clothes. In the summer, people wear beach clothes. Some people are late to church.

The church is not as formal as it used to be. People dress more casually now. This is the main thing I noticed.

I do not know the church's rules and politics. But the biggest thing I noticed is the change in dress.

Some people accused the Catholic Church of not stopping priests who abuse children. I think the church could not have stopped these problems. Some men who are married still abuse children. It is not because they are married or not married. It is because of the person's choice.

Some religions allow priests to be married. But it does not stop the abuse. The person's choice is to abuse or not to abuse.

I think people are born with their sexuality. It is not because of how they are raised. Genetics are important. You cannot hide your genetics with a marriage. If you try to hide it, it will come out.

The church cannot stop people from abusing children. If they know about it and hide it, that is wrong. But I do not think the church knew about all of the abuse.

I have no other thoughts about the Catholic Church.

I was okay with the idea at first, but I think everyone was still upset about the 9/11 attacks. We went into Iraq for reasons that may not have been true. The Bush administration connected the Iraq war to 9/11 and said Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction, but that was not true.

This makes me very upset. I think the Bush administration lied to the American people and did not admit to it. Even Colin Powell later said he was not sure about the evidence. This is wrong and can be punished.

I think the Bush administration does not respect the American Constitution. They have tried to change it since 9/11. They wanted to go to war from the beginning. 

The Secretary of the Treasury wrote a book saying that the younger Bush wanted to go to war with Iraq because of his father's experience. This was not honest.

The war has gone on too long. If we leave now, it may cause more problems and more people will die. The UN and the US are trying to work with countries in the area to help Iraq. But I am not sure this will work. Iraq will have problems with its own government.

The news says that the Iraqi government is not working well. The Prime Minister does not have control, and there are many groups fighting for power. This is causing problems for the country.

I do not know what the best solution is.

I will talk about the war in Iraq. 

I am not sure where to start. 

It is not really a declared war. I mean, we did not officially say we are at war. 

I think the United States wanted revenge because Iraq was blamed for the attacks on 9/11. 

I do not know a lot about the war, but I think we are there to help Iraq become a democracy like the United States. We also want their oil. 

But, I do not think this is a good reason to stay in Iraq. It makes many people unhappy. 

If we stay, it will take a long time to build democracy. It is not something that can be done quickly. 

If we leave, Iraqis will be angry with us. They will have to start over again. 

This is a difficult topic. I do not know what to say. 

I think the war should continue, but I do not think it should be called a war. It was not officially declared by Congress. 

We should only use force to show that we are strong and powerful. 

I do not think it is fair to call it a war anymore. It was never a real war in the first place. 

I feel bad for President Bush. The war is making him look bad. 

I remember the Vietnam War. It was also an undeclared war and it was called a meaningless war. 

I do not know what to say. 

I want the war to end, but there are many families with loved ones in Iraq. I do not want them to get hurt. 

But, I also do not want to stay in Iraq and try to change their culture. It will just make things worse. 

I think the war will continue for a long time. It will be very difficult to solve.

I do not think it is right for a state to make something legal or illegal. The constitution says there should be a separation of church and state. This means the government should not control what churches can and cannot do.

It is clear in the constitution. If the government tries to do this, it will be against what is written. I think people who want to make it illegal are choosing one church's idea over another. Most Catholics and Christians do not support this except in some areas.

The government should not tell churches what to do. The separation of church and state is an important part of the constitution. It allows for freedom of religion in the United States. Making a law to change this would be wrong.

It would be against what is already written in the constitution. It would be a law that restricts people, not the government. This is not right.

I do not think the federal government or any government should be involved in this issue. The president is pushing for a law that is against his own personal beliefs as a Catholic. This shows he has a preference for one religion over others.

I think it is up to the churches to decide, not the government. There is no good reason for the law except that some people have personal views. The law will not affect the economy, and it might even help the country.

In fact, it could have a good effect on society. I think I have said enough.

The war in Iraq was a big problem. The US government was not honest with the people about why they went to war. They said the war was connected to the terrorist attacks on September 11th. But that was not true.

I do not like war. I think the US government made a big mistake by going to war. They thought it would be easy to make Iraq a democracy. But it was not. The US government was not prepared for the problems that would come after they removed the Iraqi government.

Many American soldiers died in the war. This is very sad. The US government did not think about what would happen after they took away Iraq's government. They did not think about the power vacuum and the chaos that would come.

The US government tried to make a democracy in Iraq, just like they tried to do in Vietnam. But it was not easy. It is not easy to install a new government. It takes time and many people were against the US government's actions.

I think the US government should not have gone to war. They were not prepared for the problems that would come. They should have thought about what would happen after they removed the Iraqi government.

We have been in Iraq for a long time. Many American soldiers are still dying. The US government is still training the Iraqi army and police. This is a long process.

I think the US government was not honest with the American people. They said the war would be easy and quick. But it has not been. Democracy is not easy to create. It takes time and many people were against the US government's actions.

It is hard to decide what to do in Iraq. The US government took away the Iraqi government and their way of life. Now they have to stay and finish what they started. But they are also risking many American lives.

There are many reasons for the war. One reason was oil. The US wants to control the oil in Iraq. Another reason was that the US thought Iraq had weapons of mass destruction. But they did not find any.

I hope the war ends soon and there is peace in Iraq. But I do not think it will be easy.

I am for gay marriage. I have always been. It is a personal preference. People should have the right to make their own choices.

Gay marriage is not something you can control. Some people are born this way. It is not something you can change. 

Giving people less rights because of something they cannot control is not fair. It is inhumane.

I think politics and government should not decide who can get married. Marriage is a personal thing. It is not a government issue.

In my neighborhood, there are some gay couples. They are not married because they are not allowed to. But they are the same as other families. They take care of their homes and their pets.

The President cannot decide what marriage is. He should not make laws to tell people who can and cannot get married.

I have read that some people are born gay. It is not because of how they are raised. It is a natural thing.

Marriage should be private. If a man and a woman want to get married, they can do it in secret. But if two men or two women want to get married, it becomes a big public issue. It should not be that way.

People should be able to make their own choices about marriage. It should not be a public issue.

When you put something on the internet, it is public. Anyone can see it. 

As a resident advisor, I have seen this happen. Someone posts something online, and it affects how people think of them. 

If someone talks about hurting others or doing something bad, people will react. You cannot put that on the internet. It will be seen by everyone. 

If you are friends with someone on the internet, you will get their messages. But the school did not send the message. Someone else did. The school has to act on it because they want to keep everyone safe. 

You cannot be sure what to believe because some people are just joking. But what if it is serious? 

Something happened at my school. Someone overheard someone saying something bad. They called the school, and we found out who said it. This person had something on their Facebook that looked serious. But it was meant as a joke. 

When you put things on the internet, it is not private. If you do not want people to see it, do not put it there. You cannot control what people think. 

School officials should not be friends with students on the internet. But if someone brings something to their attention, they have to act. They have to keep students safe. 

A teacher should not make a fake account to be friends with students. That is not fair. As a resident advisor, I do not want to know about my residents' personal lives. I just want to help them if they need it.

I think the war has lasted too long. 
The original goal was good. We wanted to help another country get democracy. 

But then we lost sight of that goal. 
Now, some people think we are fighting just to show the world we are strong. 

I do not think that is a good reason to fight. 
The problem started when we were still mad about what the previous president of the US did with Saddam Hussein. 

If we wanted to give democracy to a country ruled by a dictator, that was a good reason to fight. 
But our reason for fighting changed over time. 
Now, it seems like we are fighting just to keep fighting. 

We don't want to end the war without winning, but it has been too long. 
The country we are fighting in should be able to take care of itself now. 
We are spending too much money on this war. 
We have problems at home, like poverty and bad roads. 
We should use that money to help our own people.

Our money is being spent to fight a war we may not be winning. 
We should use it for things like schools, roads and healthcare. 
This is more important than spending it to fight in a foreign country.

I have a question. I want to understand the situation.

You see, someone went online and found something. A person might not like this, but I think it is okay. If you put information on the internet, it is usually public. Many people can see it.

For example, on Myspace, you need to be friends with someone to see their profile. But if you are friends, you have given permission to see their information. So, when you are online, you must know that many people can see what you write.

I think it is good that someone saw something and helped prevent trouble. But it is hard. We can't have someone watching everyone's profiles all day. That would be unfair. We can't pick on certain people and watch them closely. That is not fair.

It depends on why someone saw the profile. Were they looking for something specific or just browsing? I don't know.

I have a Facebook account. It bothers me that there are people who can see my information. I know a man on TV who showed how easy it is to get information from someone's profile. He talked to a girl on instant messenger and got her screen name quickly.

It's hard because you think you are safe, but you are not. People can find out your interests, what you look like, and where you are. I try to limit what I put on my account, but I don't want to limit it too much. The point of having a Facebook is to communicate with friends.

I only accept people I know, but I don't know who can see my information. My roommate told me about a school that banned students from having Myspace. I don't know if that is right. Can school officials tell students what to do on the internet?

That's my thought.

I want to talk about the Iraq War. I know it's a sensitive topic. I was against the war from the start, but it's not a big deal now. Most people think it was a bad idea. 

In the United States, in Iraq, and all over the world, most people think we made a mistake. In the United States, 75 to 80 percent of people think so. In Iraq, 80 percent of people think so. 70 percent of American soldiers in Iraq also think the war was a bad idea.

Leaving Iraq will also be difficult. But it's already a disaster. We should not go into another country and try to make it like us. We must respect their way of life. 

Saddam Hussein was a bad man, but we should think before we go to war. We must think about the good and the bad. 

I don't think we should stay in Iraq anymore. We have not found a good reason to stay. If we leave slowly over a year or more, I don't have a problem. But I don't think we should stay any longer.

Most Iraqis want us to leave. They think we should be gone in a year. They are the people we are trying to help. If they say leave, we should listen. If things go badly, we can say we did what they wanted.

We can be the good guys if we leave. We will never be fully accepted in the Middle East, but we will be better than we are now.

I think gender discrimination is still a problem in the United States. It is not only for women, but also for men in certain jobs.

Women often face more difficulties in many areas. This is because of a thing called the glass ceiling. It means even if there is supposed to be equality, it is hard for people to accept a woman as their boss. This is because of how society has been for a long time.

In many jobs, women can do all the work, but they may not get promoted because it is not common for women to be in charge. This is not only for women, but also for men in jobs like fashion or being a stay-at-home parent.

In some societies, men are expected to work and make money, not stay home with the children. If a man stays home, people may think he is not doing the right thing. They may look down on him.

In the fashion industry, men who like fashion may not be taken seriously if they are not like other men. People may think they do not know what fashion is for women. But this is changing.

It is slow to change, but women are getting more accepted in business and becoming CEOs. Men who stay home with their children are also becoming more accepted. People are starting to understand that women can have good jobs and men can stay home with the children.

To change this, we need to show the good qualities of people who are stereotyped. We should not push people to accept change, but show them the good things. If we do it too fast, people will resist. We have made good progress, and change takes time.

People can be discriminated against because of where they are from or their job. For example, if someone from a farm goes to a big city and gets a job as a CEO, other people may not take him seriously because of his accent or grammar.

However, this is not just between men and women. People from different places can also be discriminated against.

My understanding is that some places don't make marijuana use a crime. Instead, they give a ticket to people who use it. This is like getting a traffic ticket. It means you don't get arrested and go to jail.

This change is good because it saves money. It costs a lot to arrest and take people to court. It costs money to pay for judges, public defenders, and the police. Some places are not willing to change the law, even if it would save them money. But some places, like Denver, are more open-minded.

In Denver, people can use marijuana and it's not a big problem. This means the city has more money to spend on good things, like education and programs to help the elderly and people who don't have food.

People should think carefully about marijuana. It's not good for everyone to use it all the time. There are reasons why it's not good to use it in public. Some people might think it's not right to see people smoking marijuana in public.

Alcohol can cause problems too. It can hurt your ability to drive and make decisions. Marijuana can also cause problems, but it's different for different people. Some people can use it and it doesn't affect them much. Others might have a harder time.

It's hard to say how people will react to marijuana because everyone is different. Some people can control how much they use, and some people can't. We should be careful when thinking about marijuana because it can have bad effects on people's lives.

I think yes. 

Because many things about the Catholic Church are old customs. 

They do things in the same way for a long time. This is good because it helps keep traditions. 

But it's also important to change. 

Many Catholics believe they must go to church every week. They are strict about how things are done. 

Sometimes I think the Catholic Church does not respect people who do not follow all the rules. They do not like people from other religions. 

For example, my mom was Episcopalian and my dad was too. They wanted to get married in the Catholic Church, but they could not because of my dad's religion. 

This is not being kind to others. The Catholic Church teaches to love others. But it's not kind to not accept people who are different. 

I think some Catholic rules are good, but the way the Church acts is different. It's not fair to say one thing and do another. 

I do not think this would change how I feel. I think it would be good to allow priests to marry, but it might not stop them from behaving badly. 

People who hurt children might do this no matter if they are married or not. 

So, I do not think allowing priests to marry would stop this from happening. It would still happen.

I am not sure about this issue. 
I don't know if one side is right or wrong. 
This is a very difficult problem. 
It is between the church and the government. 
We must define marriage without hurting anyone's feelings. 
I am not sure how to do this. 

All civil unions are the same. 
But the government may or may not give them the same rights. 
If two people are married, they should be treated the same as anyone else. 
This is a civil union, not a church thing. 

Two people are together, that is all. 
The government should not ask about the church. 
The fact that some people are gay does not matter. 
They are still two people in a union. 

If all states agree, they should make it a federal law. 
Making a rule in the constitution to stop gay marriage is not right. 
This is not important enough to change the constitution. 
We should not change the constitution just for one big issue. 

I don't think so.

I was raised in a Christian home. For me, homosexuality is a difficult issue. I have many gay friends. 

I do not agree with all aspects of their lifestyle. However, I think it should be legal. It should not be a national problem. Each state should decide for itself. The president should not make a rule for the whole country.

Some states are democratic and some are republican. Democratic states will likely support gay marriage. If you live in a democratic state, you should respect its decision. You chose to live there.

I think gay people should have the same rights as straight people. Each state should decide if it wants to allow gay marriage. It is a state's choice.

I already said this. I do not think the president should decide for the whole country. George Bush should not decide how all states should be. Each state should decide for itself. He does not live in every state.

Some things should be decided by each state. The president will leave office soon. If a new president wants to change the law, it will change back and forth. It is better if each state decides for itself. They will live with the decision, not the president.

No, I do not think the president should make this decision. It should be up to each state.

When I think about Myspace, I remember it's a public website. If you post something there, everyone can see it. This includes school officials.

If you post something on the internet, you should think about who can see it.  School officials can look at Myspace, even if they're not looking for something under the school's name. They can see it from their homes.

In my opinion, school officials have the right to see things on the internet if it helps keep students safe. If they see something that prevents a school shooting, that's good.

School officials can look at Myspace to see if students are doing things they shouldn't be doing. But I think this is an invasion of privacy. However, if they help keep students safe, I don't think it's an invasion.

It's true that the internet is a public place. But the school should be a safe place. If school officials can make it safer, that's okay.

When you post something on the internet, it's hard to control who sees it. If you write something bad about someone, you might regret it. The person could see it and it could hurt you.

In this case, the school officials were trying to keep students safe. They were checking the internet to prevent something bad from happening, like a school shooting.

School officials are like parents. When parents drop off their children at school, they want to know the school is a safe place. School officials have to make sure the school is safe.

I was in a public high school, and we practiced lockdown drills in case of an attack. We wanted to be prepared. The school officials were trying to do the same thing. They were checking the internet to keep students safe.

They were preventing something bad from happening, like a school shooting. They were doing what was necessary to make the school a safer place.

I was affected by the attack on 9/11. At first, I thought we should go to war. I wanted to help.

But I now think we made a mistake. We did not think about the long-term effects of our actions.

We did not plan carefully. We went to war without a clear goal. This led to problems.

I do not think we helped the people in that area. They fight among themselves. They cannot work together.

If they cannot work together, it does not matter if we are there or not. Our presence did not make things better.

I am sad about what happened on 9/11. But now I do not care about the situation in that area. They are not interested in helping themselves.

War is different for them than it is for us. They fight in a way that is not civilized. Our goal was not to improve their country, but to get us out of there. I think that is a good idea.

We should have thought about what might happen before we went to war. We were angry and wanted revenge. We did not think about the future.

The President declared war on Iraq. I understand why he did it. But we should have had a clear plan.

We did not know what to do in that area. We did not have a clear goal. We did not have a plan to create order. This made things worse.

I do not think we can change those people. They will always be the same. We are not doing enough to help them. We are only hurting ourselves by staying there.

We have made some progress, but it is not enough. It is time to leave. If we do not, things will only get worse. We cannot stay there forever.
